page.title: 07Trade and Shopping (cont)
page.content: Most people in the village travel into Hull to shop for items such as clothing and furniture and some also buy their food there. Most people visit a large supermarket about four miles away for their general provisions. Many of the large stores in Hull operate a delivery service for larger items and there is a regular bus service into the city. A few people visit the smaller towns of Beverley and Hornsea to shop and some travel as far as York and Sheffield and Leeds for specialist items.
